title: Strategies to protect ecology of national forests

content.question: Which of the following actions would be most likely to increase the protection of ecological systems in national forests?

choices.label: Encourage timber harvesting of old-growth forests within national parks
Allow national forest managers to use revenues from timber sales as they see fit
Encourage the building of new roads in national forests and improve existing roads
Make the growing, harvesting, and sale of timber the primary use of national forests
Mandate that the government sale of logging rights in national forests be at fair market value

content.answer: Mandate that the government sale of logging rights in national forests be at fair market value
